summary: Riften Bivouac is a small camp just a stones throw outside the Riften North Gate and Riften Stables. It is intended as a temporary site for a character starting out in Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
Description 
=========== 

Riften Bivouac is a small camp just a stones throw outside the Riften North Gate and Riften Stables. It is intended as a temporary site for a character starting out in Skyrim. If you are looking for a fully equipped mansion this is not it. It is purposefully minimalistic and may serve as a permanent or semi-permanent residence for those roleplaying a hunter/alchemist or even a thieves guild character.
It is located at the intersection of 4 cells in the game and those slightly modified include 3 :

RiftenCityNorthGateExterior
43,-22
43,-23 

Special Features
================

There is a tent, bedroll, non-respawning barrels, sacks and two strongboxes and a chest. All containers are non-respawning even though there may be some loot in some of them initially. There is a tanning rack, a small cooking spit, and an alchemy lab on top of a barrel in a hollowed out tree trunk.
There is no quest or any apparent reason for it being there and seems to have been simply abandoned. It\'s yours to use...or not.
 
 
Install 
======= 

Just drop in your Steam->SteamApps->common->Skyrim->Data folder and make sure it is checked in Data Files in the launcher.
 

 
Usage 
======

You can do whatever you want with it.

- Aquan

-----------------------------------------------------------
author: Aquan
